easy.question: I'm tall with a long neck, I eat leaves from trees. I have spots all over me. What am I?
easy.hint: I'm the tallest animal in the zoo!

easy.question: I have a trunk and I'm really big. I love to splash in the water. What am I?
easy.hint: I use my nose to pick things up!

easy.question: I'm the king of the jungle with a big mane. I roar really loud! What am I?
easy.hint: I have a fluffy mane around my head!

easy.question: I swing from branch to branch and I love bananas. What am I?
easy.hint: I can hang by my tail!

easy.question: I carry my baby in a pouch and hop around. Who am I?
easy.hint: I am famous in Australia and I hop.

easy.question: I have black and white fur and I love bamboo. What am I?
easy.hint: I'm known for rolling and cuddly looks.

easy.question: I have a long neck and humps on my back and can live in the desert. What am I?
easy.hint: I store fat in my humps.

easy.question: I hop and have big back legs and long ears. I love carrots. Who am I?
easy.hint: I have soft fur and a twitchy nose.

easy.question: I am small, colorful, and can fly. I love nectar from flowers. What am I?
easy.hint: I start as a caterpillar.

easy.question: I have a big shell and move slowly. People sometimes carry me. What am I?
easy.hint: I can live a very long time.

medium.question: I have black and white stripes to hide in the grass. Who am I?
medium.hint: Each of us has a unique stripe pattern.

medium.question: I'm a big spotted cat that climbs trees and rests on branches. What am I?
medium.hint: I often have rosettes on my coat.

medium.question: I have a long, sticky tongue that I use to catch ants and termites. What am I?
medium.hint: I have a long snout and love insects.

medium.question: I can sleep while hanging upside down in trees and move very slowly. What am I?
medium.hint: I eat leaves and am very sleepy.

medium.question: I have a long trunk and big tusks and am known for my memory. What am I?
medium.hint: I have large ears and live in family herds.

medium.question: I'm fast, can run up to 70 mph and have black tear marks on my face. Who am I?
medium.hint: I'm the fastest land animal.

medium.question: I burrow underground and roll into a ball when scared. What am I?
medium.hint: I have armor-like plates.

medium.question: I have quills for protection and roll into a spiky ball when threatened. Who am I?
medium.hint: I'm small and found in gardens and forests.

medium.question: I build dams in rivers and have a flat tail and big teeth. What am I?
medium.hint: My teeth never stop growing.

medium.question: I have a long sticky tongue, sharp claws, and sleep a lot during cold months. Who am I?
medium.hint: I hibernate in winter.

hard.question: I have branched antlers and I run in herds through forests and fields. What am I?
hard.hint: Many hunters and hikers see me in the wild.

hard.question: I'm covered in armor plates and can roll into a ball; I eat ants and termites. What am I?
hard.hint: I'm the only mammal covered in large scales.

hard.question: I am a large marsupial with thick fur and a duckbill; I also lay eggs. What am I?
hard.hint: I live in Australia and am very unique.

hard.question: I have a long tongue, sticky saliva, and a protective armored shell; sometimes called a scaly anteater. What am I?
hard.hint: My scales are illegally traded; I'm endangered.

hard.question: I am the largest living rodent and I love water. Who am I?
hard.hint: I live in groups near rivers in South America.

hard.question: I am a nocturnal primate with huge eyes and a long tail, found on Madagascar. What am I?
hard.hint: I hop between trees and make loud calls.

hard.question: I look like a horse with stripes on my legs and live in Africa; I am adapted to high altitudes. Who am I?
hard.hint: I have a velvety tongue and live in rainforests.

hard.question: I'm a large bear-like animal that eats mainly bamboo and belongs to the giant panda family. What am I?
hard.hint: I spend most of my day eating bamboo.

hard.question: I have a leathery snout, live mostly in deserts, and can close my nostrils to keep out sand. Who am I?
hard.hint: I store fat in humps to survive dry seasons.

hard.question: I am a solitary big cat with striped fur adapted for life in dense forests and marshes. Who am I?
hard.hint: I'm the largest of the big cats.

easy.question: I'm the biggest animal in the ocean. I sing beautiful songs. What am I?
easy.hint: I'm a huge mammal, not a fish.

easy.question: I have eight arms and can change colors. Who am I?
easy.hint: I squeeze through small spaces and am very smart.

easy.question: I have sharp teeth and must keep swimming to breathe. Who am I?
easy.hint: Some of us are apex predators with powerful jaws.

easy.question: I walk sideways and have a hard shell. What am I?
easy.hint: You might find me scuttling on the beach.

easy.question: I look like a tiny horse and the males carry the babies. Who am I?
easy.hint: I have a curled tail and swim upright.

easy.question: I have a shell on my back and can live in water for a long time. What am I?
easy.hint: Some of us lay eggs on beaches.

easy.question: I jump above the water and am playful; I'm very smart and often seen near boats. Who am I?
easy.hint: I have a friendly smile and often do flips.

easy.question: I glow from within at night in the sea; tiny organisms cause the glow. What is this called?
easy.hint: Tiny plankton create light when disturbed.

easy.question: I have a hard beak and many tentacles; some of my relatives squirt ink. What am I?
easy.hint: I can change color and hide.

easy.question: I'm a slow-moving sea mammal that eats sea grass and is also called a sea cow. What am I?
easy.hint: I live in warm shallow waters and graze on plants.

medium.question: I'm a giant flat fish that looks like I'm flying underwater. What am I?
medium.hint: I have wide 'wings' and filter-feed in warm waters.

medium.question: I have whiskers and big tusks, I live in cold seas and love to haul out on ice. Who am I?
medium.hint: I have long tusks and live in Arctic regions.

medium.question: I filter tiny plankton with my huge baleen plates and can be enormous. What am I?
medium.hint: I'm one of the largest animals that has ever lived.

medium.question: I make a hard calcium house and have tiny colorful animals living inside me. What am I?
medium.hint: Coral reefs are busy underwater cities.

medium.question: I use a hard shell for protection and live on reefs; some of my kind have a single large claw. Who am I?
medium.hint: Fishers catch me for seafood.

medium.question: I am known for my intelligence, complex social groups, and use of tools. I have a beak and live in coastal waters. What am I?
medium.hint: I use rocks to open shells.

medium.question: I am a fast predator with a sleek body and a tail fin shaped like a crescent. What am I?
medium.hint: I'm known for long bills and high speed leaps.

medium.question: I tuck my young into a pouch and live mostly on land near the ocean. Who am I?
medium.hint: I can balance on my front flippers and clap loudly.

medium.question: I am a tiny crustacean that glows and forms part of the ocean food chain; many sea creatures eat me. Who am I?
medium.hint: Huge whales feed on us by the bucketful.

medium.question: I live in shallow tidal areas and can regrow lost arms; I radiate from a central disc. What am I?
medium.hint: I move with tube feet and can pry open shells.

hard.question: At night I can light up the waves with my glow; tiny single-celled organisms make it happen. What are they?
hard.hint: Bioluminescent microorganisms create the glow.

hard.question: I am a toothed whale known for complex vocalizations and coordinated hunting; my black-and-white coloring is famous. What am I?
hard.hint: I hunt in pods and have a dorsal fin.

hard.question: I am an ancient armored fish with a flattened body, living on the sea floor and sometimes poisonous. Who am I?
hard.hint: I have a venomous barb on my tail.

hard.question: I have a long tusk that is actually an elongated tooth and I live in Arctic waters. What am I?
hard.hint: My tusk can grow many feet long.

hard.question: I build intricate calcium carbonate structures that form tropical underwater mountains and provide habitat for many species. What am I?
hard.hint: Tiny polyps work together to create me.

hard.question: I am a mollusk with a chambered shell used historically for measuring and as an instrument; I can jet-propel myself. What am I?
hard.hint: My shell has many chambers and shows a spiral.

hard.question: I am a cold-water baleen whale that swims in huge groups and was once hunted for oil; I'm silver-gray and fast. Who am I?
hard.hint: I have a distinctive ridge on my back behind the blowholes.

hard.question: I am a slow-moving echinoderm that feeds on dead and decaying matter on the seafloor. What am I?
hard.hint: I help recycle nutrients on the ocean floor.

hard.question: I am a fish famous for my bright warning colors and venomous spines; I invaded many parts of the Atlantic in recent decades. Who am I?
hard.hint: My sting can be painful to humans.

hard.question: I dwell in the deep sea, produce light with special organs, and lure prey with a glowing lure on my head. What am I?
hard.hint: My glowing lure attracts curious prey in darkness.
